title: PMS 2.0 311 - TNF Recap, NFL Week 14 Preview, Dana White, Rob Ryan, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys recap last night's Thursday Night Football game between the Rams and Patriots, and come to the conclusion that the Rams defense is very good, and the Patriots are pretty much officially dead. Also joining the show ahead of this weekend's UFC 256 pay-per-view, is the President of the UFC, Dana White. Pat and Dana chat about his rise to the position he's in, what makes this weekend's fights so enticing, continuing to thrive during the pandemic, his thoughts on Jake Paul boxing, what Conor McGregor's future looks like, and much more (20:29-33:37). Next, 2x Super Bowl Champion, respected coach since 1987, a man who has been the Defensive Coordinator for several NFL teams, one of the most hilarious human beings on the planet, Rob Ryan joins the program to chat about his career as a football lifer, why he plans to come back and coach next season, what he's been up to, and a few hilarious stories (43:32-1:08:56). Later, Pat and AJ Hawk chat about last night's game, and look ahead and make their picks for the NFL Week 14 slate (1:10:45-1:40:20). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
